languages.text: "Поющий Ангел там, где прежде обитал{mf||а} ты, нечестив{mf|ец|ица}, ведет нас к Многорукому Императору". {n}Улыбка женщины становится мечтательной.{/n} "Предок — дитя Многорукого Императора от крови Его. Завет, дарованный нам. Его песнь сводит нас в священном единстве. Он благо, выживание и обещание".

"The Singing Angel is where you used to dwell, impure one. From his rightful seat, he leads us to the Many-Armed Emperor." {n}The woman's smile grows dreamy.{/n} "The Sire is a child of the Many-Armed Emperor, blood of His blood — a covenant gifted to us. His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival, and promise."
languages.original_text: "Поющий Ангел там, где прежде обитал{mf||а} ты, нечестив{mf|ец|ица}, ведет нас к Многорукому Императору". {n}Улыбка женщины становится мечтательной.{/n} "Предок — дитя Многорукого Императора от крови Его. Завет, дарованный нам. Его песнь сводит нас в священном единстве. Он благо, выживание и обещание".

traits.locale_text: "The Singing Angel leads us to the Emperor-in-the-Void where the sinner used to dwell." {n}The woman's smile grows dreamy.{/n} "The Ancestor is a child of the Emperor-in-the-Void, blood of his blood. A covenant given to us. His song brings us together in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival and promise."

"The Singing Angel leads us to the Emperor-in-the-Void where the sinner used to dwell." {n}The woman's smile grows dreamy.{/n} "The Ancestor is a child of the Emperor-in-the-Void, blood of his blood. A covenant given to us. His song brings us together in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival and promise."

His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival and promise."

His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival and promise."

From his rightful seat, he leads us to the Many-Armed Emperor." {n}The woman's smile grows dreamy.{/n} "The Sire is a child of the Many-Armed Emperor, blood of His blood — a covenant gifted to us. His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival, and promise."

His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival, and promise."

languages.text: «El Ángel Cantor se encuentra donde antes habitabas, impur{mf|o|a}. Desde el asiento que le pertenece, nos guía hasta el Emperador de Múltiples Brazos». {n}La sonrisa de la mujer se vuelve encantadora.{/n} «El progenitor es un hijo del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos, sangre de Su sangre, un legado que nos ha otorgado. Su canción nos acerca en sagrada unidad. Es el bien, la supervivencia y la esperanza».
languages.original_text: "The Singing Angel is where you used to dwell, impure one. From his rightful seat, he leads us to the Many-Armed Emperor." {n}The woman's smile grows dreamy.{/n} "The Sire is a child of the Many-Armed Emperor, blood of His blood — a covenant gifted to us. His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival, and promise."

traits.locale_text: «El Ángel Cantor se encuentra donde antes habitabas, impur{mf|o|a}. Desde el asiento que le pertenece, nos guía hasta el Emperador de Múltiples Brazos». {n}La sonrisa de la mujer se vuelve encantadora.{/n} «El progenitor es un hijo del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos, sangre de Su sangre, un legado que nos ha otorgado. Su canción nos acerca en sagrada unidad. Es el bien, la supervivencia y la esperanza».

«El Ángel Cantor se encuentra donde antes habitabas, impur{mf|o|a}. Desde el asiento que le pertenece, nos guía hasta el Emperador del Vacío». {n}La sonrisa de la mujer se vuelve encantadora.{/n} «El Abuelo es un hijo del Emperador del Vacío, sangre de Su sangre, un legado que nos ha otorgado. Su canción nos acerca en sagrada unidad. Es el bien, la supervivencia y la esperanza».

languages.text: 「歌う天使は、お前のかつての住処だ、不純な者よ。その正当な席から、私たちを多腕の皇帝へと導いてくれる」{n}女はうっとりと微笑む。{/n}「サーは多腕の皇帝の子で、皇帝の血を引いている。私たちに贈られた契約だ。彼の歌は私たちを神聖な結束で結びつける。彼は善であり、生存者であり、約束なのだ」
languages.original_text: "The Singing Angel is where you used to dwell, impure one. From his rightful seat, he leads us to the Many-Armed Emperor." {n}The woman's smile grows dreamy.{/n} "The Sire is a child of the Many-Armed Emperor, blood of His blood — a covenant gifted to us. His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival, and promise."

traits.locale_text: 「歌う天使は、お前のかつての住処だ、不純な者よ。その正当な席から、私たちを多腕の皇帝へと導いてくれる」{n}女はうっとりと微笑む。{/n}「サーは多腕の皇帝の子で、皇帝の血を引いている。私たちに贈られた契約だ。彼の歌は私たちを神聖な結束で結びつける。彼は善であり、生存者であり、約束なのだ」
「歌う天使は、お前のかつての住処だ、不純な者よ。その正当な席から、私たちをヴォイドの皇帝へと導いてくれる」{n}女はうっとりと微笑む。{/n}「グランドファーザーはヴォイド皇帝の子で、皇帝の血を引いている。私たちに贈られた契約だ。彼の歌は私たちを神聖な結束で結びつける。彼は善であり、生存者であり、約束なのだ」

languages.text: “歌唱的天使居住在你曾经居住过的地方，不洁之人。他端坐在他的宝座之上，带领我们觐见四臂神皇。”{n}女人脸上露出了恍惚的笑容。{/n}“族长是四臂神皇的子嗣，是圣血之血，是祂带给我们的恩赐。他的歌声会让我们团结一心，他是善良、生存与承诺的化身。”
languages.original_text: "The Singing Angel is where you used to dwell, impure one. From his rightful seat, he leads us to the Many-Armed Emperor." {n}The woman's smile grows dreamy.{/n} "The Sire is a child of the Many-Armed Emperor, blood of His blood — a covenant gifted to us. His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival, and promise."

traits.locale_text: “歌唱的天使居住在你曾经居住过的地方，不洁之人。他端坐在他的宝座之上，带领我们觐见四臂神皇。”{n}女人脸上露出了恍惚的笑容。{/n}“族长是四臂神皇的子嗣，是圣血之血，是祂带给我们的恩赐。他的歌声会让我们团结一心，他是善良、生存与承诺的化身。”
“歌唱的天使居住在你曾经居住过的地方，不洁之人。他端坐在他的宝座之上，带领我们觐见虚空帝皇。”{n}女人脸上露出了恍惚的笑容。{/n}“祖父是虚空帝皇的子嗣，是圣血之血，是祂带给我们的恩赐。他的歌声会让我们团结一心，他是善良、生存与承诺的化身。”

languages.text: "Im Singenden Engel habt Ihr früher gelebt, {mf|Unreiner|Unreine}. Von seinem rechtmäßigen Sitz aus führt er uns zum vielarmigen Imperator." {n}Das Lächeln der Frau wird träumerisch.{/n} "Der Schöpfer ist ein Kind des vielarmigen Imperators, Blut seines Bluts ... ein Bund, der uns geschenkt wurde. Sein Lied verbindet uns in heiliger Einheit. Er ist das Gute, das Überleben, das Versprechen."
languages.original_text: "The Singing Angel is where you used to dwell, impure one. From his rightful seat, he leads us to the Many-Armed Emperor." {n}The woman's smile grows dreamy.{/n} "The Sire is a child of the Many-Armed Emperor, blood of His blood — a covenant gifted to us. His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival, and promise."

traits.locale_text: "Im Singenden Engel habt Ihr früher gelebt, {mf|Unreiner|Unreine}. Von seinem rechtmäßigen Sitz aus führt er uns zum vielarmigen Imperator." {n}Das Lächeln der Frau wird träumerisch.{/n} "Der Schöpfer ist ein Kind des vielarmigen Imperators, Blut seines Bluts ... ein Bund, der uns geschenkt wurde. Sein Lied verbindet uns in heiliger Einheit. Er ist das Gute, das Überleben, das Versprechen."

"Im Singenden Engel habt Ihr früher gelebt, {mf|Unreiner|Unreine}. Von seinem rechtmäßigen Sitz aus führt er uns zum Imperator-in-der-Leere." {n}Das Lächeln der Frau wird träumerisch.{/n} "Großvater ist ein Kind des Imperators-in-der-Leere, Blut seines Bluts — ein Bund, der uns geschenkt wurde. Sein Lied verbindet uns in heiliger Einheit. Er ist das Gute, das Überleben, das Versprechen."

languages.text: « L'Ange Chanteur se trouve là où vous demeuriez, créature impure. Depuis son trône légitime, il nous conduit à l'Empereur aux mille bras. » {n}Le sourire de la femme devient rêveur.{/n} « Le Sire est un enfant de l'Empereur aux mille bras, le sang de Son sang, l'incarnation de Son engagement envers nous. Son chant nous lie dans une unité sacrée. Il est la bonté, la survie et la promesse. »
languages.original_text: "The Singing Angel is where you used to dwell, impure one. From his rightful seat, he leads us to the Many-Armed Emperor." {n}The woman's smile grows dreamy.{/n} "The Sire is a child of the Many-Armed Emperor, blood of His blood — a covenant gifted to us. His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival, and promise."

traits.locale_text: « L'Ange Chanteur se trouve là où vous demeuriez, créature impure. Depuis son trône légitime, il nous conduit à l'Empereur aux mille bras. » {n}Le sourire de la femme devient rêveur.{/n} « Le Sire est un enfant de l'Empereur aux mille bras, le sang de Son sang, l'incarnation de Son engagement envers nous. Son chant nous lie dans une unité sacrée. Il est la bonté, la survie et la promesse. »

« L'Ange Chanteur se trouve là où vous demeuriez, créature impure. Depuis son trône légitime, il nous conduit à l'Empereur-dans-le-vide. » {n}Le sourire de la femme devient rêveur.{/n} « Le Père est un enfant de l'Empereur-dans-le-vide, le sang de Son sang, l'incarnation de Son engagement envers nous. Son chant nous lie dans une unité sacrée. Il est la bonté, la survie et la promesse. »

languages.text: "Şarkıcı Melek, eskiden olduğun yerde iffetsiz. Oturduğu yerden bizi Çok Kollu İmparator'a götürüyor." {n}Kadının gülümsemesi hülyalı bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Efendi; Çok Kollu İmparator'un evladıdır, bize armağan antta olup O'nun kanındandır. Şarkısıyla bizi kutsal bir birlikte bir araya getirir. O; iyiliktir, sağlıktır, vaattir."
languages.original_text: "The Singing Angel is where you used to dwell, impure one. From his rightful seat, he leads us to the Many-Armed Emperor." {n}The woman's smile grows dreamy.{/n} "The Sire is a child of the Many-Armed Emperor, blood of His blood — a covenant gifted to us. His song binds us in sacred unity. He is goodness, survival, and promise."
